resources.string: Day 01 - You are captain of a flagship. Your country invaded another state, although they barely have any navy. The coastline is infested with Anti-Ship Missile, and Suicide Drone. Due to energy problem and your ship inadequate maintenance, you can’t open Radar most of the time and doing so will prevent you from communicating with the rest of the crew.\n

You are captain of a flagship. Your country invaded another state, although they barely have any navy. The coastline is infested with Anti-Ship Missile, and Suicide Drone. Due to energy problem and your ship inadequate maintenance, you can’t open Radar most of the time and doing so will prevent you from communicating with the rest of the crew.\n
Day ** - You ordered your crew to maintenance the ship. \n
Day ** - You ordered your crew to maintenance the ship. They fixed some devices. \n
Day ** - You open radar. Your ship intercept 1 missile. \n
Day ** - You socialize with your crew. \n
Day ** - You socialize with your crew, you learned about *** past. \n
Your ship got upgrade in to Submarine. :)
